posts.post_title: For Sale Or Trade: 1888 A & G Jimmy Ryan BVG 6 EXMT

Posted By: Addie_Joss
Would rather a trade than a sale. I'm looking for a Joss T205, Wagner E91, Cobb issues, 1914 Cracker Jack HOFers, or a low grade N172 HOFer. The sale price is $800 but I would entertain reasonable offers.
